name: CastleCrush
description: A little game to paly together over the network

scripts.dev: concurrently -k "npm run watch:html -s" "npm run watch:css -s" "npm run watch:js -s" "npm run watch:public -s" "npm run watch:config -s" "npm run server"
scripts.dev:open: concurrently -k "npm run watch:html -s" "npm run watch:css -s" "npm run watch:js -s" "npm run watch:public -s" "npm run watch:config -s" "npm run server:open"
scripts.build: npm run build:html & npm run build:css & npm run build:js & npm run build:public
scripts.build:html: pug index.pug -o dist & pug templates -o dist/templates
scripts.build:js: browserify js/main.js -o dist/js/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] --plugins [ syntax-async-functions transform-regenerator ] ]
scripts.watch: concurrently -k "npm run watch:html -s" "npm run watch:css -s" "npm run watch:js -s" "npm run watch:public -s" "npm run watch:config -s"
